revised_title: On the Combinations of Oxymuriatic Gas and Oxygen and Their Chemical Relations to Inflammable Bodies
tldr: Humphry Davy investigates the combinations of oxymuriatic gas and oxygen, discovering their chemical relations to inflammable bodies. He also explores the properties of these substances and compares them to oxygen, finding that they share a close analogy. Davy proposes new names for oxymuriatic gas and its compounds to aid in scientific discussion and understanding.
